attributes.action: Stop the coalition government putting low income families further into POVERTY!!!
attributes.additional_details:
What the government is doing to low income families forcing them further into poverty and poor living standards.  The government should not be allowed to go back on their commitment of raising as many low income families out of poverty and scrapping the previously proposed increase to child tax credit as well as cutting working tax credits.
Stop penalising low income families for the mess the FINANCIAL SECTOR created, they should be made to pay for THEIR mistakes.The coalition government is meant to work for the interests of the 99% not help the 1% get even richer off the TAXPAYER!!!!!!!!
